news.title: Trump orders India tariff hike to 50% for buying Russian oil
news.summary: India, which now faces among the highest tariff rates imposed by the US, called the levy "unjustified and unreasonable".

news.title: New strict rules for Botox, filler and BBL providers
news.summary: The government plans to crack down on dodgy cosmetic practitioners in England who exploit people and cause harm.

news.title: Badenoch reveals how she told on exam cheat as teenager
news.summary: The Tory leader speaks about her background and values in an interview with the BBC's Amol Rajan.

news.title: I have complex PTSD but waiting list means I've only seen psychiatrist once in 10 years
news.summary: Twelve times more mental health patients are waiting more than 18 months for treatment than those with physical health conditions in England, data analysis shows.

news.title: Inner London councils to lose funding as other cities gain, report says
news.summary: The shake-up will affect the share of central government funding distributed to councils in England.

news.title: The Papers: 'Labour's tax war' and 'banter off the menu'
news.summary: Taxes are dominating the papers on Thursday morning, along with edits made to the upcoming series of MasterChef.
